entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 in the evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
